Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jsp

Class TldParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jsp.TldParser
  • public class TldParser
extends java.lang.Object
    SAX-based parser for Tag Library Descriptor (TLD) files.

    This parser reads TLD XML files and creates TagLibraryDescriptor objects containing all tag definitions, attributes, and metadata. It supports various TLD versions and handles the complete TLD specification including:

    • Library metadata (version, URI, shortname)
    • Tag definitions with attributes and variables
    • EL function definitions
    • Validator configuration

    Example TLD structure: 

     <taglib xmlns="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee" version="2.0">
   <tlib-version>1.0</tlib-version>
   <short-name>mylib</short-name>
   <uri>http://example.com/tags</uri>
   <tag>
     <name>hello</name>
     <tag-class>com.example.HelloTag</tag-class>
     <body-content>empty</body-content>
     <attribute>
       <name>message</name>
       <required>true</required>
     </attribute>
   </tag>
 </taglib>
    Author:
    Chris Burdess

      • parseTld

        public static TagLibraryDescriptor parseTld​(java.io.InputStream input,
                                            java.lang.String sourceLocation)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Parses a TLD file from an InputStream and returns a TagLibraryDescriptor.
        Parameters:
        input - the InputStream containing the TLD XML
        sourceLocation - the source location for debugging purposes
        Returns:
        the parsed TagLibraryDescriptor, or null if parsing fails
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
